description: Failed to comply with Rules and Regulations of the Football Association
(Participant) Failed to comply with a decision of the Association
(Club) Failure to comply with decision of the Association
(Affiliated Association, League or Club) Appointing a participant who is suspended. Permitting a suspended participant be appointed or to continue in role
Making a vexatious or frivolous report

Failed to ensure directors, players, officials, employees, servants, representatives attending any Match do not behave in a way which is improper, offensive, violent, threatening, abusive, indecent, insulting or provocative

additionalChargeCode.description: Failed to ensure spectators and/or its supporters (and anyone purporting to be its supporters or followers) do not behave in a way which is improper, offensive, violent, threatening, abusive, indecent, insulting or provocative whilst attending any Match
